performances.description: Ridiculous performance from everybody! Jerry and Brent/Bobby and Brent/Phil and the drummers.... Totally over the top!!!
How is this not on here already?  The Warlocks show from Virginia is the ultimate version of Dear Mr. Fantasy.
Jersey represent.  Brent was on fire that night,  this version will live in on forever as it has been remastered and available on Road Trips Volume 4.
Jerry and Brent on FIRE!!!!
This one does it for me every time!!!!!

performances.venue: Alpine Valley Music Theatre East Troy, WI
performances.description: Juicy early version , Brent sounds great as does Jerry
This one sounds great. Can't believe it doesn't have any votes
One of the better ones.

performances.venue: Oakland-Alameda County Coliseum Stadium Oakland, CA
performances.description: Brent's voice.
Part of what made this Alpine run so legendary. Soulful and Brent-astic.
Brent!!!! You all know it - might be messy but still special!
Definitive version for me and with mind melting midi.
This was definitive for me for a long time!
Brent's vocals are magnificent an impressively delivered version with a kick ass hey jude finale
Not really my song, but this is a nice version.  Jerry rips a tight little solo at the end
Jerry SHOUTS out to Mr Fantasy on last verse and then CRUSHES the jam out.

performances.venue: Henry J. Kaiser Auditorium Oakland, CA
performances.description: Really hot Fantasy->Jude with Jerry fanning away like a possessed madman, killer version
out of Space..Jerry just starts playing the intro, nice power chord from Weir too
Jerry cuts it up while Brent whoops.

performances.venue: Carolina Coliseum - University of South Carolina Columbia, SC

performances.description: Ripping version with Brent in absolute control on both the keys and vocally a standout

performances.venue: California State University Dominguez Hills Carson, CA
performances.description: There are surprisingly few really great versions of this tune, and this is one of them. Jerry takes his time, layering burning, melodic phrases.

performances.venue: Henry J. Kaiser Auditorium Oakland, CA
performances.description: Jerry and Brent are out of control with energy on this one.
Real nice version Brent really nailed this cover tune. Wish hed done more covers less of his tunes

performances.venue: World Music Theatre Tinley Park, IL
performances.description: Playin->Mr. Fantasy-> Playin  rare to be sans the hey jude finale in 1990
Excellent version out of space!
A tight, upbeat, thrilling version from the legendary March 1990 Knick run.

performances.venue: Oakland-Alameda County Coliseum Stadium Oakland, CA

performances.description: Starts with a slow boil and builds in intensity througout the song until it absolutely explodes in orgasmic fury with Brent killing it
Groovin' version from The Spectrum

performances.venue: Calavaras County Fairgrounds Angel's Camp, CA
performances.description: Brentski with the Woooooo's :)

performances.description: Ripping and rocking version, straight up rock n roll fury with Brent nailing the vocals with POWER
Tight workout that hits the peaks solidly!!!
Powerful reading from Brent, a powerful Fantasy->Jude

performances.venue: Great Western LA Forum Inglewood, CA
performances.description: A powerhouse version, Great workout from Brent.
SMoldering Brent and JErry and the drummers just sound so good here backing him up. Passionate singing! out of a crazy but short O1 and into WRat

performances.venue: Oakland-Alameda County Coliseum Arena Oakland, CA
performances.description: WOW! Love the (sort of) mellow feel to the song. Jerry puts in (imo) the best solo to this song I've ever heard

performances.venue: Alpine Valley Music Theatre East Troy, WI
performances.description: Miracle->Mr.Fantasy->Throwing Stones
Turning point of the show.  Into The Other One/Rat/SugarmagGloria Ouch
Superb transition from space into this classic Traffic cover - nailed just right on all levels

performances.venue: Madison Square Garden New York, NY
performances.description: Rousing version.
sweet version on my 16th birthday.
Coming in hot out of Space, this Fantasy absolutely rips. Jerry is shredding all over and Brent sounds great.
